creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: brown rectangle embroidered overall with approximately 10" borders top and bottom in chevron design; hand woven cotton with silk embroidery in red, gold, green and white; three sections hand stitched together
title: Danga and Laharya Phulkari
